author: alexmillereth
content:
Hello, I am implementing some utils, starting with `Deposit Data` generation. I'm currently looking at constructing the deposit `Domain`.

It looks like the  the official staking deposit CLI has hardcoded `genesis_validators_root` here: https://github.com/ethereum/staking-deposit-cli/blob/e2a7c942408f7fc446b889097f176238e4a10a76/staking_deposit/utils/ssz.py#L49

and it also uses the genesis fork version by default: https://github.com/ethereum/staking-deposit-cli/blob/76ed78224fdfe3daca788d12442b3d1a37978296/staking_deposit/settings.py#L21

I'm wondering... are these values expected to change after future forks? Or will generating deposit data based on genesis always be valid?
